doc.title: reduce
doc.description: Reduces the array to a single value.

content.name: reduce
content.description: Executes a reducer function (that you provide) on each element of the array, resulting in single output value.

params.description: The array to get last element.
params.name: reducer

params.description: The initial value for the reducer, defaults to subject[0].
params.name: initialValue

content.summary: Reduces the array to a single value.

args.description: The array to get last element.
args.name: reducer

args.description: The initial value for the reducer, defaults to subject[0].
args.name: initialValue
